about_the_game:
Otherworldly forces exist. You can make sure of this by putting together the puzzle pieces from the new game Legends of Mystery 6.

You yourself choose the desired level of difficulty for maximum enjoyment from the puzzle. Make the task more difficult and use the hint when necessary. The game has handy tools for collecting: magnifier, pocket, preview and others. At any time you can save the puzzle and continue later! This game will suit both beginners and professionals.

- Sophisticated game mode: handy hints, sorting and a magnifier
- Individual difficulty settings for each puzzle allow you to play indefinitely
- handy settings to disable the rotation mode
- 500 high quality pictures
- puzzle can be saved and continue collecting at any moment
- atmospheric music
- new part in the popular series of games
- optional: special tasks and colorful trophies
